name: Forgotten Fiction
description:
FORGOTTEN FICTION

Fanfiction is near and dear to many hearts, but how are you supposed to react when you find your past self's musings on an old laptop? Whether you cringe or cry, this is your moment. Rifle through the joys and junk of your youth, and figure out what to KEEP, and what to DELETE! It's now or never, so take the plunge!

  • Playtime ~3-5 minutes
  • Multiple Endings
  • All the Childhood Fandoms you can Never Forget!

Art by PuppetBomb

BG Image by balmasedano

Music by Edoy

This game was created as a submission for Only One of Any Asset Jam 2021.

Note: If you encounter any issues playing the game through itch.io, feel free to download the package directly.
